welcome: Welcome to the world's most up-to-date address book.
verify.header: Verify your phone by entering the code that was sent to you.
createAccount.header: Almost there! We just need your full name and an optional avatar image so others can recognize you at the party.

errors.PHONE: Please enter a valid phone number.
errors.VERIFY_CODE: Incorrect verification code, please double check your code and try again.
errors.INVALID_INPUT: One or many fields are invalid. Please try again.
errors.botDetected: We detected some bot behavior, you must be a robot?
errors.UNRECOGNIZED: Unknown Error. Please try again later.
